General.Name: Sheh Fung Screws Co Ltd
General.Description: Sheh Fung Screws Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells screws in Taiwan. It provides various screws, including self-drilling, timber construction, drywall, chipboard, self-tapping, decking, self-piercing screws, and other screws, as well as composite deck and cement board screws. It also offers hammer drill bits, customized fastener parts, kaitex coatings, and packing boxes. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: 180, E. Sec., Wen-an Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 825
